product_name: CamelBak Insulated Water Bottle Sleeve - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: Use the CamelBak Insulated water bottle sleeve to keep your 20 fl. oz. CamelBak bottle cool or warm. Neoprene material effectively insulates your bottle and helps reduce bottle condensation. Strap and loop on the side make it easy to carry your bottle in one hand or attach it to a bag with a small carabiner (sold separately). The CamelBak Insulated water bottle sleeve fits the CamelBak eddy(TM) 20 fl. oz. water bottle (sold separately).
short_description: Use the CamelBak Insulated water bottle sleeve to keep your 20 fl. oz. CamelBak bottle cool or warm.
